word:
Display, Extravagance, and Hilarity Are Inappropriate At Weddings.--Marriage ceremonies are made matters of display, extravagance, and self-indulgence. But if the contracting parties are agreed in religious belief and practice, and everything is consistent, and the 
                                                                           101
ceremony be conducted without display and extravagance, marriage at this time need not be displeasing to God.
